title: Laughing Fish has begun posting in General Discussion. . . .
body:
All I can say is this. . . .good luck to you sir!

Know that as you storm the beaches of GD in the never ending war against salt, that we the members of Memes&Games shall support you.

Even URF will show his support!
https://media.giphy.com/media/H8pxdUDswftAc/giphy.gif

Though the WMU is not finished, and delays have pushed it further and further behind in development, we shall nevertheless give you all the aid that we can.

https://media.giphy.com/media/qnsIcJTpt2t2M/giphy.gif

And to those on GD, beware. For the upvotes are coming. . . .
http://i.imgur.com/MIJhRKh.gif

replies.body:
GD can hit me with their best shot. My body is ready for them. They do not understand one thing about me:
http://www.reactiongifs.us/wp-content/uploads/2014/01/im_a_god_groundhog_day.gif
http://25.media.tumblr.com/061ce1ce15d65b2bddc994c50ae2e090/tumblr_mwd59xHbEB1sxm6jjo1_500.gif

Sounds good to me
http://49.media.tumblr.com/tumblr_ls9h7z7itr1r0rmh8o1_500.gif

https://45.media.tumblr.com/tumblr_m0a6cg8zC41rpavuyo1_400.gif
Need some music with that?
http://i.imgur.com/gs6pixp.gif
Is this some sort of Boards War or something?
https://i.imgur.com/vB9B5h.jpg?Noredirect

> [{quoted}](name=Jeddy017,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=M4KUnBaE,comment-id=00030004,timestamp=2016-02-12T02:33:30.275+0000)
>
> Is this some sort of Boards War or something?

not really. there's like 20 people who get annoyed at laughing fish when he posts which is only a small percentage of people on GD. the rest either ignore or go along with him
Though 20 people is a lot imo..

> [{quoted}](name=LightTrack,realm=EUW,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=M4KUnBaE,comment-id=0003000400010000,timestamp=2016-02-12T10:29:17.633+0000)
>
> Though 20 people is a lot imo..

considering all the different people who use the boards, and all the different people who go on GD, it really isn't a lot at all
Not the Boards. The people who directly reply to him, disagreeing.

Take the fight to them Fish.
Today, GD.
Tomorrow, MISCELLANEOUS!

Call upon your loyal servant when you need me. I will be on memes and games occasionally.

https://encrypted-tbn2.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcRhNbjoCyQYk47m-VMyid5jV1dEbI4qg9Da4-c6sOtTadj_KQvm

He finally admits it. This is probably what he looks like, right now:

http://cdn2.crushable.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/06/Austin-Mahone-shrugging-in-banga-banga-GIF.gif

> [{quoted}](name=Laughing Fish,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=M4KUnBaE,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-02-11T22:16:08.607+0000)
>
> GD can hit me with their best shot. My body is ready for them. They do not understand one thing about me:
> http://www.reactiongifs.us/wp-content/uploads/2014/01/im_a_god_groundhog_day.gif

Good luck, it's a tough crowd.

Took me forever to find this again but I give him the strength of this upvote gif

http://s1267.photobucket.com/user/Jim_Middleton/media/Wildfire-upvote-final.gif.html

Probably took longer to watch than it did to find
{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

> [{quoted}](name=DErpMAstEr651,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=M4KUnBaE,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-02-11T21:42:04.257+0000)
>
> Took me forever to find this again but I give him the strength of this upvote gif
> 
> http://s1267.photobucket.com/user/Jim_Middleton/media/Wildfire-upvote-final.gif.html

cant see it lol

Oh gawd... he's posting in another topic...

http://i2.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/newsfeed/000/691/973/e75.jpg

---
https://45.media.tumblr.com/0eda02471db61573287cab5c7050ed59/tumblr_nfcu0t1jzX1s5nlk4o1_500.gif

Heresy OP
http://i.imgur.com/B6I9a88.gif?Noredirect
The Adeptus Sororitas always get upvotes from me.

Laughing Fish, where ever you are in that Barren waste called GD, always remember you have my upvotes
http://i.imgur.com/5vX3ARC.gif

My army gathers. GD won't know what hit them
https://secure.static.tumblr.com/f447db8a78e0d1962000e0c357fbe10a/twnhsq9/vVxnya7qa/tumblr_static_tumblr_static_dkzjchcnt5w0c4s4cc4ko0o8g_640.gif
His unfunny spam is all about coming up with random situations and adding random gifs to it..
Be nice if it was at least original.
https://popcultureparables.files.wordpress.com/2015/09/haters_gif.gif

If I wanted to be reputable, I would have a different user name. ;p
That doesn't make me any less right.
http://images.memes.com/meme/669348
Not every post he makes is a good one. I think you're overreacting.

> Not every post he makes is a good one.

https://49.media.tumblr.com/afadf1c54efbe5d9828270256bfca73f/tumblr_ms4l8wbb0Y1qme5q7o1_400.gif

You're making yourself look worse by having yourself tell me that.

Memes don't make me look past the facts.
I never said every post he makes is good. I only said that he has started posting in GD.

> And to those on GD, beware. For the upvotes are coming. . . .


Riiiight...
Well if you can find the comment that proves I said every post he makes is good, than I will happily correct my reply.

> And to those on GD, beware. For the upvotes are coming. . . .  

This? It's clearly implying on it.

Except that doesn't say that every post he makes is good. It merely states that there will be upvotes.

It does not state that every post he makes will be upvoted, or that they will be good. It only states that there will be upvotes. However many upvotes will depend on if the posts are good or not, and how good they are if they are good.

But I never said that all of his posts are good.

Yeah...right.

Clearly implies on it but uses the "never literally said it" card and downvotes me for having a point. gj.

I never implied it either though. I only said upvotes were coming.

Please do not try to put words into my mouth.

From NA and doesn't know what the word "imply" means.

PS:I may be a Support main but i don't put wards in people's mouths.

Except I didn't imply anything. To imply it to hint at something without actually saying it. Which I did not do.

And also, I typed "wards" because I was typing quickly and made a spelling error.

So basically you said "Beware, for the upvotes are coming. But not for you LF maybe like 7 upvotes...most likely to someone else."

Your last sentence would make no sense in any other way than glorifying LF's posts.

Edit:Just noticed the top comment is "I'm a God.". Really?

To be perfectly clear here, I do not idealize Laughing Fish. If anything I see him like I do people at work, an equal.

And,
>Edit:Just noticed the top comment is "I'm a God.". Really?

Don't ask me. People thought it was funny and upvoted it. That's the way it works on Memes&games.

Anyway I'm not willing to continue arguing what I said anymore. I'm just going to play league and continue posting.
Well you're implying that he posts at least some good stuff. "Not every"
To that i say "maybe".
what is he your leader
http://gifsec.com/wp-content/uploads/GIF/2014/08/GIF-Conceding-Lumbergh-Office-Office-Space-OK-Ok-then-Uh-yeah-Umm-Well-then-GIF.gif?gs=a
Use that upvote bomb you've all been making ;)

>Though the WMU is not finished, and delays have pushed it further and further behind in development, we shall nevertheless give you all the aid that we can.

It is not finished.

_Pssht._ Here are the plans for the prototype.
[http://i1166.photobucket.com/albums/q619/Wgni/fish_zpsyd8xmedl.png](http://i1166.photobucket.com/albums/q619/Wgni/fish_zpsyd8xmedl.png)

Everyone knows the boards are about a big as a popularity contest as a high school football team captain just happening to be the coaches son.

Laughing Fish will be fine, he has a following even if he said,  "Give Lee Sin W and Q true damage" it would be upvoted. That's how the boards work. 

His meme's and games are legend though.

also...that is why Riot ignores a lot of whiny posts. 

For example if you're into Player Behavior and Moderation boards upvotes follow this step.

Title: OMG I HAVE BEEN PERMABANNED

Context: No just kidding, I'm a good person. = insta likes.
